question: I have diabetes and last saturday my sugar got real low and my friend said it sounded like i was gagging, so he came into the kitchen and he said it looked like i was fixin to pass out so he came up behind me and put his arms under my pits and then we free feel to the ground, with him landing first and then me landing on him, and now my left shoulder blade and surrounding area hurts real bad, what could i have done? I have been laying on a heating pad all week, and it just seems to be getting worse.
title: shoulder pain
